solution_line_template: The drive has {photo_size_kb} * {max_photos} = <<{photo_size_kb}*{max_photos}={total_storage_kb}>>{total_storage_kb} kilobytes of storage space.
It already has {photo_size_kb} * {current_photos} = <<{photo_size_kb}*{current_photos}={taken_storage_kb}>>{taken_storage_kb} kilobytes of storage space taken up.
Thus, it has {total_storage_kb} - {taken_storage_kb} = <<{total_storage_kb}-{taken_storage_kb}={remaining_storage_kb}>>{remaining_storage_kb} kilobytes of space left.
The portable drive can store {remaining_storage_kb} / {video_size_kb} = <<{remaining_storage_kb}/{video_size_kb}={num_videos_stored}>>{num_videos_stored} 200-kilobyte videos on it with 400 photos.
